About Us

"The University Innovation Fellows (UIF) program is a global initiative that aims to empower students to drive innovation and entrepreneurship on their university campuses. The UIF cohort of 2022 at the Salzburg University of Applied Sciences is a group of highly motivated and creative individuals who are dedicated to improving the campus atmosphere and fostering a culture of innovation.

As UIF fellows, our goal is to work with the university administration, faculty, and fellow students to identify challenges and opportunities for innovation and to create programs and initiatives that promote design thinking, entrepreneurship, and an entrepreneurial mindset. We believe that through these efforts, we can create a dynamic and inclusive campus environment that fosters creativity, collaboration, and innovation.

Our activities include workshops, hackathons, pitch events, and other initiatives that encourage students to take an active role in shaping the future of their university and their communities. We also work to connect students with resources and support networks that can help them bring their ideas to life. Whether you're an aspiring entrepreneur, a student interested in design thinking, or simply someone who wants to make a positive impact on your campus, we welcome you to join us in our efforts to create a more innovative and inclusive university community."
